title: 820-3115 pp3v3_s0 shorted.
message: Board reads 0.005 short to ground in diode mode 4.99 ohms in resistance mode.  If I inject voltage, it draws a hair over 1 amp, but nothing gets hot.  CPU gets warm. Any pointers?

title: 820-3115 pp3v3_s0 shorted.
message: CPU has no 3v3_s0 connection. Do you mean the PCH is getting hot?

title: 820-3115 pp3v3_s0 shorted.
message: Yes sir the PCH, my mistake.

title: 820-3115 pp3v3_s0 shorted.
message: Yeah, if that is getting hot it is dead. If you are replacing it the BIOS will need fixing too, but only after you have at least an image on the LCD again.

title: 820-3115 pp3v3_s0 shorted.
message: Thanks, that ones going to the bottom of the pile.
